item.title: Tesla Awards CEO Musk Millions of Shares Valued at About $29 Billion
item.description: The move comes just six months after a judge ordered Tesla to revoke Musk’s massive pay package.

item.title: 3 Tiny Behaviors That Make You the Calmest Person in the Room
item.description: A few small actions, grounded in the biology of behavior, can shift not only how you feel in stressful situations, but how others respond to you.

item.title: Use Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang’s 1 Simple Trick to Get the Best Answers From AI
item.description: The Nvidia chief has a front-row seat for the AI revolution. Here’s how he gets the best answers from AI tools.

item.title: Should I Stop Bringing Treats for My Team?
item.description: I’m frustrated with the lack of appreciation.

item.title: The Labor Market Confirms That the Fed Has Made a Policy Error
item.description: Economic data makes Jerome Powell’s patience look like a mistake.
